import math

def func(x,b,c):
 ans=x*x+b*x+c
 ans/=math.sin(x)
 return ans


for asd in range(int(input())):
 b,c=map(float,input().split())

 st=0
 en=math.pi/2
 iterations=0
 ans=func(en,b,c)
 while en-st>0.000001:
  if iterations>100:
   break

  x1=st+(en-st)/3
  x2=en-(en-st)/3
  fx1=func(x1,b,c)
  fx2=func(x2,b,c)
  if abs(fx2-fx1)<0.00000001:
   break
  ans=min(ans,min(fx1,fx2))
  if fx2<fx1:
   st=x1
  else:
   en=x2
  
  iterations+=1
 print("%.12f"%ans)
